reviewText: This is a great video about Atlantis from the History Channel. It is without a doubt that the Greek Island of Santorini is Ancient Atlantis. In fact the History Channel just came out with another show called "Atlantis Found". In the Mega Disasters Video. one of the main speakers is sitting near a famous mountain in Imerovigli. After watching this video many times I finally climbed this mountain this past year in Santorini. This is a fantastic video. And this narrator says that this apocalypse could happen again within the next twenty years!
